boardgame.name: Conflict of Heroes: Awakening the Bear! (second edition)
Conflict of Heroes: Awakening the Bear! – Operation Barbarossa 1941 (second edition)
Conflict of Heroes: Der Bär erwacht!
Conflict of Heroes: Le Réveil de l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Ours (second edition)
Conflict of Heroes: ¡El oso despierta!
boardgame.description: Awakening the Bear is the first game in the multi-award winning Conflict of Heroes series. In it, players control individual squads and tanks to resolve the same tactical dilemmas and decisions that commanders faced during some of the most ferocious engagements of WWII._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;CoH features a fast and fluid system that is easy to learn but realistic to all of the unique theaters of battle portrayed. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Fun: Quick simultaneous play allows players to interact without waiting._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Easy: Teach a new player how to play in under 5 minutes. No charts!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Historically Accurate: Portrays realistic forces and tactics. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Counters: Depict individual vehicles, airplanes, guns, squads and more. _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Consistent: Each game in the series uses the same rule system._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2nd Edition includes all new artwork, more units _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; firefights._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This thread discusses the differences between 1st and 2nd edition in more detail._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: Academy Games (AYG5011) The year is 1941. Germany has defeated Poland, Denmark, Norway, and France with ease. In the morning hours of June 22 over 3 million German soldiers attacked Soviet forces along a 1600 kilometer front heralding the beginning of Operation Barbarossa. Complete surprise was achieved and the Germans struck deep into Soviet territory. The Germans thought that the Soviets would fold like a house of cards. Their officer cadre had been massacred by Stalin, training was poor, and morale low. The Blitzkrieg catches the Soviets by surprise and they lose over 1.75 million men in the first two months alone. The Germans are unstoppable, their Panzers pushing to the very gates of Moscow. But then winter hit and the cold drained the German_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s resources, strength, and morale. The Soviets began striking back in the dead of winter and the momentum began to shift in their favor through the following spring. The bear had awoken! Awakening the Bear! - Russia 1941-42 takes you to the eastern front during Operation Barbarossa, the German invasion of Russia. Many consider this time period to be the birth of modern warfare tactics that continue to be used and perfected by today_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s modern armies.

Academy Games (AYG5011) The year is 1941. Germany has defeated Poland, Denmark, Norway, and France with ease. In the morning hours of June 22 over 3 million German soldiers attacked Soviet forces along a 1600 kilometer front heralding the beginning of Operation Barbarossa. Complete surprise was achieved and the Germans struck deep into Soviet territory. The Germans thought that the Soviets would fold like a house of cards. Their officer cadre had been massacred by Stalin, training was poor, and morale low. The Blitzkrieg catches the Soviets by surprise and they lose over 1.75 million men in the first two months alone. The Germans are unstoppable, their Panzers pushing to the very gates of Moscow. But then winter hit and the cold drained the German_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s resources, strength, and morale. The Soviets began striking back in the dead of winter and the momentum began to shift in their favor through the following spring. The bear had awoken! Awakening the Bear! - Russia 1941-42 takes you to the eastern front during Operation Barbarossa, the German invasion of Russia. Many consider this time period to be the birth of modern warfare tactics that continue to be used and perfected by today_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s modern armies.

ITEM DESCRIPTION: Purchased new and played once. All components and box are in excellent condition with no signs of shelf wear. Cards kept in sleeves. Stored in a pet-free and smoke-free home. PAYMENT TERMS: Payment is due within 3 days of the date you placed the order. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. Will accept payment via PAYPAL or money order (will not ship until money order is cashed). SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for shipping cost. I will only charge the actual CanadaPost or UPS (your choice) shipping prices (lowest possible). Shipping within Canada is usually around $15 CAD. Shipping to the US is usually less than $30 CAD. Invoice and confirmation will be provided upon shipping. Will ship games in heavy cardboard box with newspaper/bubblewrap padding. Please see my trade feedback for reviews. LOCAL PICK-UP: Local pick-up is available around Hamilton, ON, Canada. Please send me a message for details. INSURANCE: Extra insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Please contact me with any questions or photo requests. Thanks for looking!
